name: Factory Battle Card
description: Factory Battle Cards (Repair Edition) is a multiplayer  duel card game where the goal is to repair damaged machines before the opponent and win scores! Each player is given a mixed deck of cards with both repair and damage properties. 9 damaged machines are to be fixed in the arena which can be either repaired to a certain amount(amount that is shown in the card) or damaged(using a damage card). each turn player gets to choose only one card on any one of the repairable machines. Whoever is able to repair any machine is his turn gets a score equal to the machines full health. A player who has the highest score at the end of the match wins the game!
